text: The 1975 Rothmans International Trophy was a men's professional tennis tournament held on indoor carpet courts at the Royal Albert Hall in London, England. It was the fifth edition of the event and was held from 4 March until 8 March 1975. The tournament was a special non–ranking event on the 1975 World Championship Tennis circuit consisting of eight nations and 16 players.
